short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facilitate creating a cohesive record of outgoing communications with our alumni from LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Used to facilitate the recording of messages -sent- by staff via LinkedIn on our CRM. This is part of an attempt to capture all contact points.

The extension will not work without a valid token.
